scripts.start: npm run download && npm run cloudflare-delete && npm run cloudflare-create
scripts.dry: npm run download && DRY_RUN=1 npm run cloudflare-create:list
scripts.cloudflare-create: npm run cloudflare-create:list && npm run cloudflare-create:rule
scripts.cloudflare-delete: npm run cloudflare-delete:rule && npm run cloudflare-delete:list
